roleset.name: having great power, influence

role.descr: what the power is used for-- secondary action

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6.

example.name: arg1-emotional power
example.text: " Treating the soft environment as cherishing our life , " the statement by this party secretary is so powerful ,
example.arg: [the statement by this party secretary] *link-> [" Treating the soft environment as cherishing our life , "]

example.name: both args
example.text: God's Word is Powerful to Accomplish all His Purposes.

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: The video they created simulating an active shooter in a school is powerful to watch.
example.note: Watching the video is powerful; the video itself does not provide power for watching. This is why this instance uses concatenation instead of arg2.
example.arg: [The video they created simulating an active shooter in a school] [to watch]
